content: MI-SGC M16 Hot-dip galvanized (HDG) single beam clamp for connecting MI steel baseplates to steel beams ### Categories: Home > Products > Modular support systems > System connectors and interfaces- - - ### FEATURES:Features Corrosion protection of steel beam is not damaged by beam clamp Beam clamp is equipped with set of vibration-resistant washers Applications Compatible with steel beams with flange thicknesses from 12-28 mm and angle of up to 15° ### TECHNICAL DATA: Thread connection - M: M16 Material composition: Clamp: EN-GJMB-350-10 - DIN EN 1562, EN-GJMW-400-5 - DIN EN 1562, EN-GJMB-450-6 - DIN EN 1562; Bolt: Steel grade 8.8; Nut: Steel grade 8 Surface finish: HDG: Clamp 55 µm - DIN EN ISO 1461; U-bolt, Nut 45 µm - DIN EN ISO 1461 Technical Data | Thread connection - M | M16 | Material composition | Clamp: EN-GJMB-350-10 - DIN EN 1562, EN-GJMW-400-5 - DIN EN 1562, EN-GJMB-450-6 - DIN EN 1562; Bolt: Steel grade 8.8; Nut: Steel grade 8 | Surface finish | HDG: Clamp 55 µm - DIN EN ISO 1461; U-bolt, Nut 45 µm - DIN EN ISO 1461 | Environmental conditions | Outdoor, low to moderate pollution (C3 / C4 - low) | Tightening torque | 133 ft-lbf | Wrench size | 24 mm | Width - B | 1.3 in ### ITEMS- 387398 - Beam clamp MI-SGC-M16 - Package Size 12 pc Package Contents: - 1x MI-SGC-M16 Beam clamp assy
